Summary: WALKING DOWN THE TRAIL IT WAS JUST GETTING DARK WHEN I SAW A BRIGHT LIGHT IN THE SKY
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS WALKING DOWN RAIL TRAIL FROM DUNSTABLE TO PEPPERELL I WAS ABOUT UNQUITTYNESSTTE BROOK IT WAS JUST GETTING DARK WHEN I SAW A BRIGHT LIGHT FOR ABOUT 10 SEC. I LOOKED UP AND THE LIGHT WAS GONE IT FOLDED UP ON IT SELF , BUT THE BEAM WAS STILL THERE SO I WATCHED THIS BEAM OF LIGHT WITH NO SOURCE FOR A WHILE NO AIR CRAFT IN THE AREA , I GOT TO MY FRIENDS HOUSE I DIDNT SAY ANY THING YO ANYONE AND THEN I HEARD A FRIEND TIM TALKING ABOUT THIS LIGHT HE SAW I WAS SHOCKED WE TALKED ABOUT THIS AND WE SAW THE SAME THING AT THE SAME TIME IN DIFFERENT LOCATIONS HE WAS STANDING IN BUBS YARD LOOKING TOWARDS THE RIVER AND I WAS ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE RIVER LOOKING AT THE OBJECT I WOULD HAVE NEVER SAID ANY THING UNTIL TIM SAID SOMTHING AND IT WAS LIKE I FORGOT UNTIL HE HAD MENTIONED THE SIGHTING TO ME IT LOOKED LIKE A SEARCH LIGHT FROM A HELICOPTER BUT WITH NO COPTER NO SOUND . THE CRICKETS AND THE PEEPERS GOT QUIET
